header.title: Anti-Spam ACP 1.0.5
Anti-Spam ACP 1.0.5
header.description: Anti-Spam ACP adds many powerful anti-spam features to your phpBB3 forum such as an Akismet integration, Stop Forum Spam Integration, an IP Search tool, Spam Word list, control over profile fields, flagging suspicious users (for logging their actions), and an easy one click ban link from their profile which clears out their profile and posts.

Anti-Spam ACP ajoute nombreuses et puissantes fonctionnalités anti-spam à votre Forum phpBB3 comme Akismet integration, Stop Forum Spam Integration, IP Search tool (un outil de recherche d'adresses IP), Spam Word list (liste de mots spam), control over profile fields (contrôle des champs de profil), flagging suspicious users (balisage utilisateurs suspects pour suivre leurs actions), et un bannissement à partir de leur profil qui efface leur profil et leurs messages en un clic.
